description: This file defines internal API function prototypes for the Slap Obj Broker component within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) of a BroadWay Service Delivery System. It includes function declarations for managing object brokers, such as checking removability, setting path names, retrieving, adding, and deleting object brokers.

methods.name: SlapOboIsRemoveable
methods.description: Checks if the object broker can be removed.

methods.name: SlapOboSetPathName
methods.description: Sets the path name for the object broker.

methods.name: SlapOboGetObjBroker
methods.description: Retrieves an object broker handle for a given path.

methods.name: SlapOboAddObjBroker
methods.description: Adds a new object broker at the specified path.

methods.name: SlapOboDelObjBroker
methods.description: Deletes the object broker at the specified path.

methods.name: SlapOboDelAllObjBrokers
methods.description: Deletes all object brokers managed by this component.
